content: Hello! Thank you for reaching XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I have your name, please?
Thanks, Linda! Could you please provide your address so we can verify service availability in your area?
Thank you! I’ve confirmed that we service your area. Can you please briefly describe the plumbing issue you’re experiencing?
Isn’t it obvious? I said plumbing. Just send someone.
I’m sorry, in order to book the right technician and prepare them, I do need a brief job description. Can you tell me a bit more about the plumbing issue?
I don’t have time for this. You should have all that information from before.
I’m sorry that I’m unable to proceed without a brief description of your plumbing issue. Let me connect you with a member of our team who can assist further.
reason: Customer refused to provide job description.

content: Hi Linda, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. I understand you're having a plumbing issue. Could you please let me know a bit more about what’s going on so we can get the right technician to you?
Fine, my kitchen sink is backing up and won’t drain.
Thank you for the info. When would be a convenient time for one of our plumbers to come by today or tomorrow?
Got it, Linda. I’ll book you for tomorrow morning. You’ll get a confirmation shortly. Thank you for your patience!
